title: Thunderbird abbrviating new groups
content:
Thunderbird by default abreviates new groups, which makes our review news groups unintelligible. This has been dealt with before, but solutions are not working for me on the newest Thunderbird. Alternative solution :

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/config-editor

I can change the setting mail.server.default.abbreviate, but it does not change the display without a reset. After a reset the setting is back to true.

The link mentions saving the setting with a tick box, but I cannot see a tick box.

Please advise. Thanks, Steve.
creator: steve.barton

title: Thunderbird
content: Thunderbird would not open so I called a technician who set it back up. I have the icon on my desk to, but it will not open and I have to go back to Tunderbird Set up # 128 and reinstall it. What shall I do. Thank you, Treva
creator: queenorsa3

title: I want to customize the default display.
content: I always find it useful. I have one problem. I usually only display [Attachments][Subject][Recipient][Date], but the default displays [Thread][Star], etc., and I have to edit them each time. Is it possible to create a [User default] by changing the settings? Thank you.
creator: sawadaj.osam

title: where to setup auto-reply
content:
I've recently installed Thunderbird 128. I want to setup auto-reply but I have not found where to enable it despite looking through Settings and Account Settings.

I have composed an auto-reply and saved it as a Template - however, I cannot find where it is saved.

Also, the Actions in Manage Message Filters does not list "Reply with Template".

Any idea how to resolve this, please?
creator: acgjsy
